author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vocera Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.29
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Vocera Communications Inc:
* VOCERA ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER REVENUE OF $45.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.40 TO $0.63 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.23 TO $0.31 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.09 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $175 MILLION TO $183 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $37 MILLION TO $40 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 26 PERCENT TO $45.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 TO $0.48 * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.03 TO $0.11 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $43.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $188.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $43.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
